import React from 'react' import ReusableModel from '../../../components/layouts/ReusableModel' import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid' import TextField from '@mui/material/TextField' import InputLabel from '@mui/material/InputLabel' import MenuItem from '@mui/material/MenuItem' import FormControl from '@mui/material/FormControl' import Select from '@mui/material/Select' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const UpdateCategoryModel = (props) => { const { size, handleClose, onSubmit, show, modalTitle, expandedArray, checkedArray, handleCategoryInput, categoryList, } = props return (
Expanded Categories
 {expandedArray.length > 0 && expandedArray.map((item, index) => ( handleCategoryInput('name', e.target.value, index, 'expanded')} /> Select Category Select Type ))}
Checked Categories
 {checkedArray.length > 0 && checkedArray.map((item, index) => ( handleCategoryInput('name', e.target.value, index, 'checked')} /> Select Category Select Type ))} {/* */} ) } export default UpdateCategoryModel
